short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Pixiv Ugoira Animations to WebM video files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert any ugoira animation to WebM or GIF at pixiv.

Features:
-Convert ugoira animations to GIF or WebM.
-Select either convert resized animation or full screen animation (if available).
-Choose whether download, view or replace the original animation with the converted media.

For questions, reporting issues or suggesting changes you can send an email to Levi Castillo at lothar.one@gmail.com.
